mapper.select: select ifnull( concat(#{s_code}, concat('r', max((substr(r_code, 5)) + 1))), concat(#{s_code}, concat('r', 1))) as new_code from tbl_review where s_code = #{s_code}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(r_code, s_code, u_code, r_content, r_rating) values(#{r_code}, #{s_code}, #{u_code}, #{r_content}, #{r_rating})
insert into tbl_review(s_code, u_code, r_content) values(#{s_code}, #{u_code}, #{r_content})
mapper.select: select r.*, u.u_id from tbl_review r, tbl_user u where s_code = #{s_code} and r.u_code = u.u_code order by review_date desc
mapper.update: update tbl_review set u_code = 'u000' where u_code = ( select d_code from tbl_user_delete where datediff(now(), (tbl_user_delete.d_date)) >= 14 )
